title: Google\Cloud\Compute\V1\AllocationSpecificSKUAllocationReservedInstanceProperties
name: AllocationSpecificSKUAllocationReservedInstanceProperties
description:
Properties of the SKU instances being reserved. Next ID: 9

Generated from protobuf message google.cloud.compute.v1.AllocationSpecificSKUAllocationReservedInstanceProperties

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.local_ssds
params.description: Specifies amount of local ssd to reserve with each instance. The type of disk is local-ssd.

params.name: data.machine_type
params.description: Specifies type of machine (name only) which has fixed number of vCPUs and fixed amount of memory. This also includes specifying custom machine type following custom-NUMBER_OF_CPUS-AMOUNT_OF_MEMORY pattern.
